attributes.action: Stop Job Seeking benefits being paid to those who don't finish their education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, it is possible to leave school aged 16, pre-exams, and then sit on the dole for the rest of your life, which attempting to search for work.

Bring in a law whereby if you do not complete your education to a minimum standard (i.e. basic English and maths/an apprenticeship etc), you cannot claim Job Seekers Allowance on the grounds that you have not attempted to make yourself employable.
